subject: Wages and Salaries
lead_paragraph: Arlen Kantarian’s base salary for his final year with the organization was $1.6 million. He earned $2.3 million in bonuses and the rest in deferred performance-based incentives.
snippet: Arlen Kantarian’s base salary for his final year with the organization was $1.6 million. He earned $2.3 million in bonuses and the rest in deferred performance-based incentives.
